recipe.title: Aquavit Spritzer
instructions: Combine sugar and 1 tablespoon hot water in a pitcher. Stir to dissolve. Add preserves. Using a wooden spoon, stir to loosen preserves and mix with simple syrup. Gently stir in soda water and aquavit.
Fill tumblers with ice. Divide aquavit spritzer equally among glasses and garnish each with a lemon twist.
